uk.co.greedygull.screen

Class GameoverScreen

  • Object
    • Screen
      • GameoverScreen

  • public class GameoverScreen
extends Screen
    Author:
    Matej This screen is displayed upon the Game Over scenario when the player runs out of stamina. It displays their final score, distance and any skill points gained. It also displays if the score or distance has surpassed the high score.
